resources.string: This screen displays a menu of the lists that can show their music. Items that could be shown here are \"All Songs\", \"Playlists\", \"Albums\" and similar.
This screen displays a list of the users songs, shown based on what the user chose in the menu screen
This view is the actual music player activity for the app. Here you can play, pause, access settings, change songs etc.
This view allows the user to change the app\'s settings.
Here you can play, pause, fast-forward, rewind and change song.
